item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, March 28, 2024 at 9:35 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Thames Water shareholders signal readiness to take £5bn hit
2. FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried sentenced to 25 years in prison for fraud
3.  For young people, the job search has never been so miserable
4. Angela Rayner refuses to publish tax records as police probe house sale
5. Military briefing: Ukraine digs deep as Russians advance
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, March 28, 2024 at 9:35 PM UTC
